subject: RE: [junit] Re: displaying tests results/errors in a servlet/jsp
msgSnippet: This is a hack, and I m not sure if it works, but you could try having your servlet run ant directly (assuming you have ant setup to run the JUnit tests).
messageBody:
This is a hack, and I'm not sure if it works, but you could try having your
servlet run ant directly (assuming you have ant setup to run the JUnit
tests).

Something like:

String[] args = { "-buildfile", "pathtofile", "junit" };
org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(args);

Have ant run the tests, format them to HTML pages, then view the results
from your browser.

HTH,
Stephen
